items.sentence: Tom stopped and turned around to see if anyone was following him.
I would've told you earlier, but I didn't think you'd understand.
Have you finished reading the book that I lent you the other day?
A man came out of the log cabin with the shotgun on his shoulder.
If Tom had refused to do it, somebody else would've had to do it.
Do you really think Tom is the best French speaker in your class?
What made you think that I was going to go to Australia with Tom?
Tom and Mary told everybody they were planning to live in Boston.
Tom and Mary both said that they weren't studying French anymore.
Tom told Mary he was planning on staying in Boston until October.
